name: Technotron Defense
description: Techotron Defense is a stylish tower defense game with relaxing soundtrack and deep and hardcore tower defense gameplay
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Card with OpenGL support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 140 MB available space
